    • Method Detail

      • createCoupon

        public boolean createCoupon(Coupon coupon,
                            long companyId)
                     throws MyCouponSystemException
        A function which tries to create a new coupon for the current company
        Parameters:
        coupon - The coupon that the company wishes to buy.
        companyId - Id of the company which creates the coupon.
        Returns:
        True if coupon was created.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen when the coupon title is the same as another one in DB.

      • removeCoupon

        public boolean removeCoupon(Coupon coupon,
                            long companyId)
                     throws MyCouponSystemException
        A function which receives a coupon and deletes it.
        Parameters:
        coupon - The coupon which will be removed.
        companyId - Id of the company whose coupon will be removed.
        Returns:
        True if the coupon was removed.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen when getting data from DB has failed.

      • updateCoupon

        public boolean updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
                     throws MyCouponSystemException
        A function which updates an existing coupon price and end date.
        Parameters:
        coupon - The coupon which will be updated.
        Returns:
        True if the coupon was updated.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen when received coupon id is null.

      • getCoupon

        public Coupon getCoupon(long couponId)
                 throws MyCouponSystemException
        A function which receives an id and returns the corresponding coupon.
        Parameters:
        couponId - An id of a coupon to get.
        Returns:
        a Coupon object that with the same id.Null if Couldn't get the coupon.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen if the received id is null.

      • getAllCoupons

        public java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> getAllCoupons(long companyId)
        A function which returns all of the company coupons.
        Parameters:
        companyId - Id of the company whose coupons to get
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of all of the company coupons.

      • getAllCouponsByType

        public java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> getAllCouponsByType(CouponType type,
                                                       long companyId)
        A function which returns the company coupons of the same type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the coupons to get.
        companyId - Id of the company whose coupons to get.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of the company coupons.

      • getAllCouponsByDate

        public java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> getAllCouponsByDate(java.time.LocalDate date,
                                                       long companyId)
        A function which returns the company coupons with the same end date.
        Parameters:
        companyId - Id of the company whose coupons to get.
        date - The date to filter the coupons (up-to the date)
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of all of the company coupons up-to the date.

      • getAllCouponsByPrice

        public java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> getAllCouponsByPrice(double price,
                                                        long companyId)
                                                 throws MyCouponSystemException
        A function which returns the company coupons with the same price.
        Parameters:
        price - The price to filter the coupons (up-to the price)
        companyId - Id of the company whose coupons to get.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of all of the company coupons up-to the price.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen if either the price or the received Id is null.

      • getCurrentCompany

        public Company getCurrentCompany(long companyId)
                          throws MyCouponSystemException
        A function which returns the company with the given Id.
        Parameters:
        companyId - Id of the company to get.
        Returns:
        A Company object which represent current connected company.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen if the received Id is null.

      • login

        public long login(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String password)
           throws LoginException
        A function to check for login info of different companies.
        Specified by:
        login in interface CouponClientService
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the company.
        password - Password of the company.
        Returns:
        the company id if the login info is correct.
        Throws:
        LoginException - Can happen when there is no company with the same name and password in DB.
